typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GENDER as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		DEPT as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		NAAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> EMPSINCACHE
EMPSINCACHE sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
